text:
My daughter has been taking piano lessons with Miss Jean for the above 6 years, and we have been incredibly impressed. Miss Jean is fantastic with kids and knows how to make each lesson engaging and fun.
Miss Jean is incredibly patient and always take the time to explain things in a way that my daughter can understand. She is  always punctual and professional.
I highly recommend Miss Jean to any parent looking for a piano teacher for their child. Thank you, Miss Jean for making piano lessons such a positive experience for my daughter!

I highly recommend Ms Jean as a piano teacher. Her patience, expertise, and passion for music create a wonderful learning environment. She tailors lessons to each student's needs, making learning both enjoyable and effective. My daughter’s piano skills have significantly improved under their guidance!

Miss Jean is not only a skilled and patient piano teacher but also excels in making learning enjoyable and interactive, creating a nurturing learning environment. Thanks to her patient guidance, my daughter has shown remarkable progress in her piano skills!

My younger brother has been learning piano under Miss Jean for 4 year already. And I must say both my mother and I are extremely impressed with his progress. His hard work, coupled with Miss Jean’s consistency in her quality of teaching as well as her patience and gentle guidance has greatly encouraged him to pursue his interests in piano. One can definitely sense her sincerity and genuineness when teaching a student, and she always makes sure that a student is fully ready before taking any examinations. Definitely highly recommend her as a piano teacher; whether for beginners or intermediate.
Miss Jean is an excellent piano teacher. Her dedication and patience towards students are reflected in every detail of her daily teaching. Students love her and parents support her.
